entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pilot Mound 9:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -31.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -34.1°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the evening then light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
